text: Streets of Gold is a 1986 American boxing drama movie directed by first time director Joe Roth and starring Klaus Maria Brandauer, Adrian Pasdar, Wesley Snipes, John Mahoney, Elya Baskin. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * Category:1986 drama movies Category:1980s sports movies Category:American sports drama movies Category:Cold War movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies set in New Jersey Category:Boxing movies
title: Streets of Gold (movie)
